billing_account_id.description: Which billing account id to create resources in

disable_tls.description: Whether to connect the API endpoint using TLS

data_center_id.description: The unique identifier of the datacenter where the network is located.

external_ip_address.description: External IP of the network router

gateway.description: Internal IP of the network gateway

internal_ip_address.description: Internal IP of the network router

ip_range.description: IP range of network in CIDR format e.g 192.168.0.0/24

data_center_id.description: The unique identifier of the datacenter where the network is located.

icmp_type.description: Specific ICMP type of the rule. If a type has multiple codes, it includes all the codes within. This can only be used with ICMP

id.description: The unique identifier of the rule

ip_range.description: A single IP address or CIDR format range to apply rule to

ports.description: A comma separated list of ports (80,443,8080) or a single port range (1024:2048)

protocol.description: Protocol for rule, use one of: all, tcp, udp, icmp, icmpv6, ipsec

data_center_id.description: The unique identifier of the datacenter where the disk is located.

id.description: The unique identifier of the storage disk

project_id.description: The project the storage disk is in.

size_gib.description: Size of the storage disk in GiB

image_id.description: ID of OS image on boot disk

size_gib.description: Size of boot disk in Gib

commitment_months.description: The minimum length of time to commit to the VM instance. It cannot be deleted before the commitment end date.

data_center_id.description: The id of the datacenter where the VM instance is located.

external_ip_address.description: The external IP address of the VM instance.

internal_ip_address.description: The internal IP address of the VM instance.

metadata.description: Metadata values to associate with the VM instance

assign_public_ip.description: Assign a public IP to the NIC

external_ip_address.description: The external IP address of the NIC.

internal_ip_address.description: The internal IP address of the NIC.

network_id.description: ID of private network to attach the NIC to

security_group_ids.description: Security groups to assign to the NIC

password.description: Root password for linux, or Admin password for windows

project_id.description: The project the VM instance is in.

renewable_energy.description: Whether the VM instance is powered by renewable energy

security_group_ids.description: Security groups to assign to the VM when using public networking

ssh_key_source.description: Which SSH keys to add to the VM: project (default), user or custom

ssh_keys.description: List of SSH keys to add to the VM, ssh_key_source must be set to custom

start_script.description: A script to run when VM boots

disk_id.description: ID of storage disk to attach to vm

data_center_id.description: The ID of the data center where the image is located.

size_gib.description: Size of the image in GiB

vm_id.description: The ID of the VM with the disk to generate an image from.

source.description: The source vm disk or snapshot to generate the image from

data_center_id.description: The id of the datacenter where the network is located.

external_ip_address.description: External IP of the network router

gateway.description: IP of the gateway for the network

internal_ip_address.description: Internal IP of the network router

ip_range.description: IP Range in CIDR format e.g 192.168.0.0/24

data_center_id.description: Datacenter ID to request security groups from

rules.description: List of rules in security group

data_center_id.description: The unique identifier of the datacenter where the disk is located.

project_id.description: The unique identifier of the project the disk is in.

size_gib.description: Size of the storage disk in GiB

boot_disk_size_gib.description: The size of the boot disk in gibibytes (GiB).

data_center_id.description: The unique identifier of the datacenter where the VM instance is located.

external_ip_address.description: The external IP address of the VM instance.

gpus.description: The number of GPUs attached to the VM instance.

id.description: The unique identifier of the VM instance.

image_id.description: The unique identifier of the image used to create the VM instance.

internal_ip_address.description: The internal IP address of the VM instance.

memory_gib.description: The amount of memory allocated to the VM instance.

metadata.description: The key value pairs to associate with the VM.

project_id.description: The unique identifier of the project the VM is in.
